name: Kitsuninjas
description:
Kitsuninjas is an arena fighting game for up to 4 players, set in the feudal (and animal) kingdom of Japan. The game is being developed by Funsize Bonsais, a collective of game design students at Uppsala University, Campus Gotland.

---

Goal of the game:

Score as many points as possible during a match.  You score points by defeating your opponents in hand-to-hand combat, and by capturing the flag. Capturing the flag and holding on to it is the best way to score points.

---

How to play

The game is local multiplayer and best experienced with handheld controllers. On game startup you will enter the game lobby where the control scheme is explained.

To join with mouse and keyboard, press "Z".  To slash and dash, press or hold "Space". To use a collectible (e.g. throw a shuriken), press "Left Shift". Move with WASD keys.
